TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract FromRssFeedRuleCondition implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._FromRssFeedRuleCondition

Docs.summary: Represents a rule condition that evaluates whether an item is from a specified RSS subscription.

remarks.para: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object. Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object. However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event. Refer to this topic for information about the COM object. For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

FromRssFeedRuleCondition is derived from the object. Each rule is associated with a object, which has a property. The FromRssFeed property always returns a FromRssFeedRuleCondition object. If the rule has any of these rule conditions enabled, then is True.
For more information about specifying rule actions, see Specifying Rule Conditions
